mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_display_item (item_ref_id, item_type, sort_order) VALUES (#{itemRefId}, #{itemType}, #{sortOrder})
mapper.select: SELECT tdi.*, CASE WHEN tdi.item_type = 'group' THEN g.group_name WHEN tdi.item_type = 'category' THEN c.category_name END AS item_name FROM tb_display_item tdi LEFT JOIN tb_group g ON tdi.item_type = 'group' AND tdi.item_ref_id = g.group_id AND g.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN tb_category c ON tdi.item_type = 'category' AND tdi.item_ref_id = c.category_id AND c.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN tb_group_category gc ON tdi.item_type = 'category' AND gc.category_id = tdi.item_ref_id AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tb_group WHERE group_id = gc.group_id AND deleted = 0) WHERE (tdi.item_type = 'group' AND g.group_id IS NOT NULL) OR (tdi.item_type = 'category' AND gc.category_id IS NULL AND c.category_id IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY tdi.sort_order;
